TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed AddInSecurityLevel extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定授與應用程式定義域的信任層級，這個應用程式定義域中載入增益集。

span.span: Specifies the trust level that is granted to the application domain that an add-in is loaded into.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 增益集系統就會啟動增益集對應至增益集應用程式定義域指定的信任層級的權限集合。The add-in system activates the add-in with the permission set that corresponds to the trust level specified for the add-in's application domain. 該權限集合是由 common language runtime 的程式碼存取安全性 (CAS) 組態中定義。That permission set is defined by the common language runtime's code access security (CAS) configuration. 無法使用位元 OR 運算結合的值，這個列舉型別。The values of this enumeration cannot be combined by using the bitwise OR operation. ## Examples 下列範例會啟動增益集與指定的信任層級。The following example activates an add-in with a specified trust level. [!code-csharp[AddInP3Host#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/addinP3Host/cs/P3Host.cs#5)] [!code-vb[AddInP3Host#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/addinP3Host/vb/p3host.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInSecurityLevel FullTrust = int32(2)

summary.span: 對於允許讀取及寫入本機檔案系統、建立網路連線，以及讀取登錄的增益集，使用完全信任的安全性層級。

span.span: Use the full trust security level for add-ins that are allowed to read and write to the local file system, create network connections, and read from the registry.

summary.span: 這個安全性層級會套用 欄位，授與增益集程式碼存取安全性 (CAS) 的完整存取權限。

span.span: This security level grants full access to the add-in's code access security (CAS) by applying the field.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInSecurityLevel Host = int32(3)

summary.span: 使用主應用程式安全性層級，將目前授與裝載程式碼的相同使用權限提供給增益集。

span.span: Use the host security level to give the add-in the same permissions currently granted to the hosting code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此設定有兩種用途：This setting has two purposes: - 它代表主機可以授與的最大的權限集的增益集。It represents the maximum permission set a host can grant to its add-ins. - 它可讓 ClickOnce 或 Extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) 瀏覽器應用程式 (XBAP) 主機傳播其原來網站的其增益集，讓他們能夠連線到伺服器。It allows a ClickOnce or an Extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) Browser Application (XBAP) host to propagate its site of origin to its add-ins, which enables them to contact the server.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInSecurityLevel Internet = int32(0)

summary.span: 對於有低信任層級的增益集，使用網際網路安全性層級。

span.span: Use the Internet security level for add-ins that have a low trust level.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInSecurityLevel Intranet = int32(1)

summary.span: 對於位在公司內部網路上的增益集，使用內部網路安全性層級。

span.span: Use the Intranet security level for add-ins that are located on a company's intranet.

summary.span: 由於伺服器和資訊是在公司防火牆內，因此這些增益集可以有較大的信任層級。

span.span: These add-ins can have a greater trust level because the servers and information are within a company's firewall.
